description:
Over the course of the Hundred Years War, many men rose to power and took leadership roles in the http://anidb.net/ch90342 [Secret Society]. One such man was http://anidb.net/ch90341 [Gilgamesh] General Albert Killy, whose expertise in manipulating lives and military resources placed him in an ideal position to capitalize on his agenda of greed and deception. At the end of the war, Killy and his men launch "Operation Lido," the invasion of a Melkian research base hidden inside an asteroid on the galactic rim. There, they steal not only a strategic reserve of gold ingots, but also the top secret http://anidb.net/ch40573 [prototype] of the Melkian Perfect Soldier Project. From that point on, they become the direct target of a Melkian investigation, but Killy has already taken many steps to make himself a force to be reckoned with. Ironically, the one element Killy does not foresee in this deadly game proves to be the most dangerous: http://anidb.net/ch15676 [Chirico Cuvie].
Source: MAL
name: Albert Killy
